txt.en: 'You have dealt a significant blow to the Ungoledain once again, [placeholder]. Their numbers have been weakened... for now.'

'Remember how I was afraid of that wizard in the woods? Well I tell you those woods are no good! Apparently those spider-folk are back and they're very upset! I can't possibly retrieve resources in Óinsbridge knowing they're around!

'We need to drive them out of Óinsbridge! Are you... well, will you go do it?'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
'Could you leave as soon as possible? The Ungoledain pose a great threat to Óinsbridge.'

Óinsbridge stands where the Forest River snakes into Mirkwood at the edge of the Thornholt,. A once-mighty span that has crumbled to a precipitous and treacherous skeleton athwart the water, now under siege by the regrouping Ungoledain.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to to Stráhek the Stout in Skarháld and let him know of your victory at Óinsbridge.
